title: Spring salad of cucumber, lentils and tarragon

ingredients.item: 110g pack fine asparagus, trimmed and cut into 3cm pieces 300g frozen or fresh petits pois
1 cucumber, peeled, deseeded and finely diced
400g can green lentils, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: To make the dressing, whisk the tarragon, shallot, mustard and lemon zest and juice together. Season and gradually whisk in the olive oil.

Bring a pan of water to the boil, then add the asparagus pieces and petits pois. When the water has come back to the boil, drain and refresh under cold water. Drain again and pat dry on kitchen paper.
Combine the dressing with the vegetables, cucumber, lentils and pea shoots. Serve as a light lunch, or as an accompaniment to grilled fish or chicken
